scripts.deploy-dev: sed -i 's/CudqgI5NIfKsEo7fEersJiDBF85FInOp/'"$OAUTH0_DEV_CLIENT_ID"'/g' src/auth0.js && sed -i 's/http:\/\/localhost:3000/https:\/\/mymeds-dev\.surge\.sh/g' src/index.jsx && npm run build && surge build/ mymeds-dev.surge.sh
scripts.deploy-prod: sed -i 's/p4b5yvjakk/dzmwu65136/g' src/api/api.js && sed -i 's/CudqgI5NIfKsEo7fEersJiDBF85FInOp/'"$OAUTH0_PROD_CLIENT_ID"'/g' src/auth0.js && sed -i 's/http:\/\/localhost:3000/https:\/\/mymeds\.surge\.sh/g' src/index.jsx && npm run build && surge build/ mymeds.surge.sh
